title: Call Complaints - Complaint
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Complaint made for the Call Complaints domain.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to Complaint.

status.description: Property. Status of the Complaint. Examples: Pending, In progress.

timestamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The timestamp of the Complaint.

category.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The category of the Complaint.Examples:Brown water, Particles, Odor / Taste, Illness, Meter leak, Network leak, No water, Low pressure, High pressure, Broken switch, Water quality, Waste of water, Broken meter, Meter repositioning, Sidewalk repair, Pavement repair.
